BibleTime Compound List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
  • BibleTime (The main class of BibleTime)
  • BT_BASICFILTER (This is the base class for all filters in BT)
  • BT_GBFHTML (This filter converts GBF Text into HTML)
  • BT_ThMLHTML (This filter converts ThML text to HTML text)
  • CBibleKeyChooser (This class implements the KeyChooser for bibles and commentaries)
  • CBiblePresenter (The presenter used for Sword Bibles)
  • CBookKeyChooser (The keychooser implementation for books)
  • CBookTreeChooser (The keychooser implementeation for books)
  • CBTConfig (This class is the interface to the config object of BibleTime)
  • CCommentaryPresenter (The presenter used for Sword commentaries)
  • CExportManager (Contains the functions to export text to disk, clipboard or printer)
  • cfx_btn (This Class implements the direct chooser button used in the KeyChooser Widget)
  • CGroupManager (The groupmanager which handles all the modules and bookmarks)
  • CGroupManager::ToolTip (Our tooltip class)
  • CGroupManagerItem (An item which implements functions to get the module of this item)
  • CHTMLChapterDisplay (The display which renders a chapter)
  • CHTMLDialog (This is a general dialog to show long error messages or report and solutions (Perhaps from an FAQ file))
  • CHTMLEntryDisplay (The display class for entry based modules)
  • CHTMLWidget (This widget enhances the KHTMLWidget to support BibleTime's colour management and to support verse references and the like)
  • CInputDialog (This is a small input dialog with a multiline edit for the text input)
  • CKeyChooser (The base class for the KeyChooser)
  • CKeyChooserWidget (This class implements the KeyCooser Widget, which consists of a QComboBox, two normal ref @QToolButton and a enhanced cfx_btn)
  • CLexiconKeyChooser (This class implements the KeyChooser for lexicons)
  • CLexiconPresenter (Presenter used for lexicons)
  • CMDIArea (The MDI widget we use in BibleTime)
  • CModuleChooserBar
  • CModuleChooserButton
  • COptionsDialog (The optionsdialog of BibleTime)
  • CPointers (Holds the pointers to important classes like modules, backend etc)
  • CPrintItem (The class which implements the printable items)
  • CPrintItemList (A KListView derived class which handles CPrintItem classes)
  • CPrintItemListPage
  • CProfile (Manages one profile file)
  • CProfileMgr (The manager for profiles)
  • CProfileWindow (Contains the settings for one window saved in the profile)
  • CReferenceManager (Contains static functions to compute with referneces used for Drag&Drop and for hyperlinks used in HTML)
  • CSearchDialog (The searchdialog of BibleTime)
  • CSearchDialogAnalysis (CSearchDialogAnaylsis shows the graphical analysis of the search result)
  • CSearchDialogAnalysisItem (Paints the bars for one book for one or more modules)
  • CSearchDialogModuleChooser (A widget to select the modules in which you want to search)
  • CSearchDialogResultModuleView (Handles the search result)
  • CSearchDialogScopeChooser (This class (CSearchDialogScope) provides the graphical user interface for the scope part of the searchdialog)
  • CSearchDialogText (First tab page of the searchdialog)
  • CStyleFormat (A class which contains methods to support a format for the CStyle class)
  • CStyleFormatFrame (A class which represents the frame around different CStyleFormats)
  • CStyleListPage
  • CSwordBackend (This is the implementation of CBackend for Sword. The backend implementation of Sword)
  • CSwordBibleModuleInfo (This is the CModuleInfo imlementation for Bible modules managed by Sword. Implementation for Sword Bibles)
  • CSwordBookModuleInfo (Class for generic book support)
  • CSwordCommentaryModuleInfo
  • CSwordKey (The base class for all Sword based keys)
  • CSwordLDKey (This class is the implementation of CKey used for dictionaries and lexicons)
  • CSwordLexiconModuleInfo (The implementation of CModuleInfo for the Sword lexiccons and citionaries)
  • CSwordModuleInfo (Base class for Sword modules)
  • CSwordModuleSearch (CSwordModuleSearch manages the search on Sword modules)
  • CSwordPresenter (Base class for all Sword based presneters The base class for all Sword based presenters)
  • CSwordTreeKey (BibleTime's implementation of Sword's TreeKeyIdx class)
  • CSwordVerseKey (The CKey implementation for verse based modules (Bibles and Commentaries))
  • CToolClass (Provides some useful functions which would be normally global. A class which contains static members to do small things)
  • KStartupLogo (This class provides a startuplogo)
